{{cpp/keyword/title|{{tt|and}}}}
{{cpp/keyword/navbar}}

===Usage===
* [[cpp/language/operator alternative|alternative operators]]: as an alternative for {{tt|&amp;&amp;}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
int main()
{
    static_assert((false and false) == false);
    static_assert((false and true)  == false);
    static_assert((true  and false) == false);
    static_assert((true  and true)  == true);
}
}}
